display_long_description:
Gorilla Tag Deluxe is an exciting virtual reality game designed for players aged 13 and up, offering a unique blend of fast-paced gameplay and social interaction. Step into the wild as a playful gorilla and explore a vibrant, expansive jungle filled with lush landscapes, towering trees, and thrilling obstacles.

In this immersive VR experience, you’ll engage in heart-pounding tag matches with friends or players from around the globe. Use intuitive controls that mimic real gorilla movements—swinging, climbing, and leaping through the environment—making every game an exhilarating workout.

What makes Gorilla Tag Deluxe truly special is its extensive customization options. Unlock a wide array of cool cosmetics to personalize your gorilla. From colorful fur patterns to fun accessories like hats and sunglasses, you can express your unique style while you play.

The game features various modes, including classic tag and team challenges, ensuring that each session remains fresh and exciting. Join friends in private lobbies or dive into public matches to meet new players, fostering a lively community atmosphere.

With captivating graphics, engaging mechanics, and a focus on social play, Gorilla Tag Deluxe invites you to unleash your inner gorilla in a wild adventure. Get ready to swing, climb, and tag your way to victory while customizing your look and connecting with friends in this unforgettable VR experience!
